scripts.publish:latest: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm compliance && pnpm publish --tag latest --dry-run
scripts.publish:next: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm compliance && pnpm publish --tag next --dry-run
scripts.clean:deps: pnpm run --parallel -r clean:deps && npx rimraf node_modules
scripts.integration: pnpm integration:setup && pnpm integration:run; RES=$?; if [[ "$RES" != "0" ]]; then pnpm integration:log; fi; pnpm integration:teardown; exit $RES
scripts.integration:single: pnpm integration:setup && pnpm integration:run:single; RES=$?; if [[ "$RES" != "0" ]]; then pnpm integration:log; fi; pnpm integration:teardown; exit $RES
scripts.integration:clean: docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
